programme.title: Metro
programme.desc: Passengers aboard a Russian subway train become trapped by rising flood waters.

programme.title: The Minion
programme.desc: A holy man (Dolph Lundgren) and an archaeologist (Francoise Robertson) seek a key that will stop a demon from releasing the Antichrist.

programme.title: Metro
programme.desc: Passengers aboard a Russian subway train become trapped by rising flood waters.

programme.title: The Minion
programme.desc: A holy man (Dolph Lundgren) and an archaeologist (Francoise Robertson) seek a key that will stop a demon from releasing the Antichrist.

programme.title: Luc Van Tien: Kung Fu Warrior
programme.desc: An ancient warrior time travels to modern-day Vietnam to battle a criminal organization and find his true love.

programme.title: Fighting Ace
programme.desc: Kung fu masters show a young man how to avenge his slain parents.

programme.title: World of the Drunken Master
programme.desc: A legendary martial artist drinks his way through battles.

programme.title: The Fate of Lee Khan
programme.desc: Women (Li Hua Li, Helen Ma, Mao Ying) fight Mongols in 13th-century China.

programme.title: Delta Space Mission
programme.desc: In the year 3084, an advanced spaceship called Delta is created to establish dialogue between intergalactic civilizations. Soon after an alien journalist boards the ship, she and the captain realize the AI that controls the ship can act on its own.

programme.title: Scorched Earth
programme.desc: A post-apocalyptic bounty hunter tries to bring down a ruthless outlaw.

programme.title: Earthtastrophe
programme.desc: In the aftermath of a blinding flash, people on Earth learn that their planet has been sucked through a wormhole.

programme.title: The Doomsday Machine
programme.desc: People (Denny Miller, Mala Powers, Grant Williams) on a spaceship ponder repopulation after seeing Earth destroyed on their way to Venus.

programme.title: The Quiet Earth
programme.desc: Something goes wrong with a New Zealand scientist's (Bruno Lawrence) energy experiment: only the dying survive it.

programme.title: Big Monster Wangmagwi
programme.desc: Aliens from another world that are seeking the conquest of Earth invade with flying saucers. They unleash a gigantic monster called Wangmagwi, which destroys everything in its path.
